subject: FW: Early Bird Special: Renew 103.177.193.167's SSL to Save
preview: Hi Nichole,  I hope all is well.  Confirmed, SSL for Grange is included with their hosting package, so there's no need for a separate SSL purchase.

full_threads.body:
Hi Nichole,

I hope all is well.

Confirmed, SSL for Grange is included with their hosting package, so there's no need for a separate SSL purchase.

Hi team


Please can you confirm SSL for grange below is not required - i.e you have it covered already with their hosting I believe.

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
 The Envest Group

+61 425 699 660

nichole@envest.com.au

Level 7, 545 Queen Street, Brisbane, QLD, 4000



Visit: envest.com.au
 Follow us:

From: Sahil Tulsiani <Sahil@envest.com.au>
Date: Monday, 28 April 2025 at 12:20 PM
To: Dean Cook <dean@grangeinsurance.com.au>, Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>, Edward Eveille <edward.eveille@envest.com.au>, Alberto Yanes <alberto.yanes@envest.com.au>
Subject: Re: Early Bird Special: Renew 103.177.193.167's SSL to Save

HI Nic,


Please can you double check this is not related to the grange website? I had a look and the IP is different.


@Dean Cook if not website, then most likely this would be to the legacy remote server, but I don't think anyone logs into it anymore?


@Edward Eveille please can we plan out the decommissioning of this old hardware? Was it on premise or hosted by MSP? We can get Keiran on site if required.


Thanks,     

Sahil Tulsiani
Chief Information Officer
The Envest Group

+61 403 022 359

Subject: FW: Early Bird Special: Renew 103.177.193.167's SSL to Save

I'm not sure what this is so can you please let me know if we still require it.

Thanks

Dean Cook

Director
